text: @piersmorgan While you are on your deathporn watch, can you tell me how many died of heart attacks, non covid flu, suicides, drug overdoses, and good old fashion old age? Or are those all classified as #coronavirus deaths. The brits still using leeches instead of #HydroxyChloroquine
